snippet: Officials credited Jacob Rodriguez, 11, and Joseph Koch, an off-duty officer in Queens who heard his cries, for saving Jacob’s mother from an attacker.
abstract: Officials credit 11-year-old Jacob Rodriguez of South Jamaica Queens, and Joseph Koch, an off-duty police officer, for saving Jacob’s Christina Rodriguez from attacker Jose Bernazard; both Officer Koch and Bernazard are recovering from gunshot wounds sustained in the struggle.

byline.original: By NATE SCHWEBER and J. DAVID GOODMAN

lead_paragraph: Officials credited Jacob Rodriguez, 11, and Joseph Koch, an off-duty officer in Queens who heard his cries, for saving Jacob’s mother from an attacker.

headline.main: Boy Praised for Saving His Mother in an Attack
headline.print_headline: Boy Praised For Saving His Mother In an Attack
